ref: 13602a saira -- ʻ belonging to a plough ʼ &capatodmacr [sīˊra -- ]
WPah.kṭg. séri f. ʻ terraced and irrigated field ʼ, J. śēr, śeri f. ʻ long field (usu. of rice) ʼ,
H. sīr m. ʻ land cultivated by owner ʼ < sī́ra- (Him.I 211 compares sirā́ -- whose sense ʻ stream ʼ and variant śirā -- are, however, unconfirmed).
H. sīr m. ʻ land cultivated by owner ʼ < sī́ra- (Him.I 211 compares sirā́ -- whose sense ʻ stream ʼ and variant śirā -- are, however, unconfirmed).
